programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Woman's Day: Selfless Soul Receives Moments of Joy One Surprise at a Time
programme.desc: Kar is a selfless soul known for his unwavering commitment to the unhoused in his community. It's Kar's turn to have some good old-fashioned fun.

programme.title: Sports Town Stories
programme.sub-title: Sports Town Stories: Baltimore Invests in the Next Generation
programme.desc: From ice hockey to lacrosse to tennis, Baltimore coaches help drive the next generation to find family, inspiration and pride through sports.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: Unanswered Questions
programme.desc: A teen murdered but no suspects. A woman allegedly killed by a panhandler

programme.title: Boston Rob Does Beantown
programme.sub-title: Boston Rob Does Beantown: Return to the North End
programme.desc: Rob journeys back to his old stomping grounds, tastes some of the most authentic Italian food the city has to offer and tests his swing on the neighborhood's popular pickle ball courts.

programme.title: Plate It Picklesburgh
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Plate It Picklesburgh

programme.title: Chaos & Kindness
programme.sub-title: Chaos & Kindness: A Surprise Tribute to a New Hampshire Father Battling Cancer
programme.desc: The team creates a beautiful sculpture for a New Hampshire dad battling terminal cancer so his family can remember him even when he's gone.

programme.title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.sub-title: Lost Innocence: The Tragedy of Harmony Montgomery
programme.desc: A police investigation into a missing seven-year-old girl in Manchester, New Hampshire reveals harrowing details that shock the state. But even more disturbing is the discovery that the tragic outcome could have been avoided.

programme.title: Americas Most Delish
programme.sub-title: America's Most Delish Midwest: 10 Unexpected Eats with Midwest Flair
programme.desc: Uncover the Midwest's unexpected. From quirky to inventive flavor mash-ups like the bulgogi burger to the questionable sour cream & raisin pie, see how the area crafts some interesting but delightful culinary concoctions.

programme.title: My Perfect Day
programme.sub-title: My Perfect Day with Women's Day: Nurturing Nurse Steps Up To The Front Line For A Day Full Of Surprises
programme.desc: Dedicated mom and nurse, Cleo, spends a day filled with surprises. This incredible mother has overcome obstacles no parent should have to face. Cleo and her sons cook up some quality time.

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Blind Kitchen: Re-Match
programme.desc: Chef Cristina Quackenbush of Milkfish takes on Chef Jennifer Cole of Laurel Oak in a blindfold battle of international influences! They may not have matched on a dating app, but in the kitchen it’s a match-up for the ages.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Spin and Shag in Greer, SC
programme.desc: Near the foothills of the Blue Ridge Mountains, go for a spin on the track and on the dance floor. Order a tiny coffee and get cozy in a tiny house. Chat up alpacas and introduce yourself to the granddaughter of a legendary four-legged athlete. It’s all possible in Greer, South Carolina.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It! Baltimore: Putting the Charm in Carb City
programme.desc: Charm City becomes Carb City in this bread-driven battle. Watch as chefs Ferhat Yalcin and Jonathan Hicks see who can carbo-load their way to victory.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Making Time for Fun
programme.desc: Daniel Johnson juggles three jobs and is a single father to three kids. Kinga meets with Daniel in Pittsburgh, PA to help him ‘clock out’, reconnect with nature, and experience some quality “me time.”

programme.title: Free Spirit
programme.sub-title: Free Spirit: How New Orleans Cocktails are Bigger than Bourbon Street
programme.desc: Kate regains her faith in the classic Hurricane, talks history and equity in the cocktail industry, pledges allegiance to the French 75, and dives into a rich New Orleans cocktail culture that’s much bigger than Bourbon Street.

programme.title: Ed & Day in The 'Burgh
programme.sub-title: Ed and Day in the ‘Burgh: Living It Up in Lawrenceville
programme.desc: Ed and Day explore the many sides of Lawrenceville. From sword fighting and thrifting to making wine and burgers, the guys experience the beauty of this eclectic neighborhood.

programme.title: Rickwood: The Soul of Birmingham
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Unlock the Mystery in Florence, SC
programme.desc: The charming town of Florence, South Carolina is booming. Explore the revitalized downtown, try your best to solve an escape room, and grab a bite at a local food truck. You can also stay the night on a farm and wake up to your own private petting zoo!

programme.title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.sub-title: Bringing Down The House: The Bombing of Harvey's Casino
programme.desc: In the summer of 1980, two men wheeled what looked like an IBM computer into a Lake Tahoe casino. The events that followed rocked the industry, baffled bomb technicians, and changed the lives of a criminal’s and a casino magnate’s family forever.

programme.title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.sub-title: Game Gone Wild: The Socker Slam Story
programme.desc: A stranger than fiction documentary that chronicles a semi-scripted extreme sporting league that premiered in 2000. Socker Slam took elements of wrestling, rugby and “butts up” shenanigans and body slammed them into a soccer drama.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: Show Me Milwaukee
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Local radio personality, Greg Adams, wants to shine a light on all parts of his beloved city and prove that Milwaukee has a lot more to offer than people might expect. In each episode, Greg is joined by a notable personality from the community who shows him their favorite spots and the best ways to experience them.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate It, Pittsburgh!: Summer Cookout
programme.desc: Fire up the grill and pour a cold one. Chefs Carleen King and Neil Blazin are facing off in a Summer Cookout cook-off. Can our chefs keep their cool? Or will they melt down in the summer heat?

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Watch things heat up in the kitchen as two local chefs go head-to-head to create a three-course meal utilizing ingredients sourced from one of the city’s unique marketplaces.

programme.title: What's On The Menu?
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: What's On The Menu?

programme.title: Blind Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Chefs recreate each other’s signature dish, but they can only determine what the dish is using their senses of taste, touch and smell. When the masks come off, the heat is on, with each chef attempting to cook their opponent’s creation.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A true crime series telling the story of unfathomable crimes that have rocked American communities leaving them forever changed.

programme.title: Weathering the Storm
programme.sub-title: Weathering the Storm: Couple Faces Historic Tornado on Eve of Wedding
programme.desc: On December 10, 2021, a violent tornado outbreak hit western Kentucky. It was the deadliest weather event in the history of the Commonwealth. But as families faced a bleak holiday season, hope emerged in surprising ways.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Crimes, Cons & Capers explores some of the wildest headline-grabbing crimes and far-fetched escapades from across the country including bizarre love scams, high-speed car chases, risky prison breaks and more.

programme.title: Plate It!
programme.sub-title: Plate it, Pittsburgh!: Between The Bread
programme.desc: In honor of Pittsburgh's love of handhelds, Chef Claudy Pierre and Chef Alex Brown get creative crafting their best sandwich-inspired dishes.

programme.title: Chronicle: Pittsburgh After Dark
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) In this episode of "Chronicle," we're going to look at the side of Pittsburgh you don't normally see: When the sun does down and the moon comes up.

programme.title: Wait, What Happened?
programme.sub-title: Wait, What Happened?: She Ate What Out of Her Pocket?
programme.desc: What strange snack did a woman eat at a football game? What ice cream flavor was inspired by a hot dog topping? Frank Nicotero is asking these questions and more, as Cincinnati locals try to win cash prizes.

programme.title: Finding Adventure
programme.sub-title: Finding Adventure: Crime Fighter in Plane Sight
programme.desc: While dedicating her time to criminal justice reform, Erinn placed connecting with nature on the back burner. She’s a free spirit who travels the world and jumps out of planes but doesn’t know what Kentucky has to offer – it's time to change that.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Eat Play Stay: Dare to Zip Over Rock Hill, SC
programme.desc: Rock Hill, South Carolina is chock full of adventure. From zip-lining through the trees to wake boarding with a pro. You can also admire beautiful murals by local artists, visit hard cider orchards and get snuggly in a romantic lakeside cabin.

programme.title: Hometown Tragedy
programme.sub-title: Hometown Tragedy: The Toy Box Killer
programme.desc: One evening in 1999, Cythnia Jaramillo shows up at a home wearing nothing but a dog collar. She had been tortured and sexually assaulted for days. Her escape leads investigators to discover a gruesome string of kidnappings and murders.

programme.title: Maker Nation Challenge
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation Challenge: Artists Forge Fine Jewelry Masterpieces
programme.desc: Three jewelry makers in Greenville are about to take on some heavy metal as they go head-to-head to design and build an arm cuff inspired by the Liberty Bridge. Will their designs be too arm-twisting for the judges?

programme.title: Maker Nation
programme.sub-title: Maker Nation: Iron + Resin
programme.desc: A Pittsburgh blacksmith, and an acrylic pour-artist in Boston.

programme.title: Always Remember Your Name
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: A documentary of mistaken identity, hope, love, and the power of story by two Holocaust survivors.

programme.title: Chronicle: Legacy of Flight 427
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: (2024) Recounting the tragedy of US Airways Flight 427 that crashed in Beaver County, and talking with families and first responders 30 years later.

programme.title: Rickwood: The Soul of Birmingham
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: This is the story of the oldest professional ballpark in the U.S. and the determination of its home team, the Black Barons. The voice of Rickwood tells the tale of its pivotal role in The Negro League, Black history and its legacy in American sports.

programme.title: Crimes, Cons & Capers
programme.sub-title: Crimes, Cons and Capers: Citizen vs. Con
programme.desc: Sometimes the bad guys are busted by regular people! These stories showcase good Samaritans stopping suspects in their tracks.

programme.title: Eat Play Stay
programme.sub-title: Episode 1
programme.desc: Experience serious vacation vibes and discover some of the most special corners of America on this guided tour of must-visit cities.

programme.title: Unbelievable
programme.sub-title: Unbelievable: Rescues From the Brink
programme.desc: Brace yourself for heart-stopping heroics as rescuers leap into action! A semi-truck teeters dangerously over the Ohio River, a devastating gas explosion reduces homes to rubble, and a capsized cargo ship leaves its crew fighting for survival.
